name: Num Dá Véi
storyline:
As usual, William always finds a way to make Marcão’s day as stressful as possible with his games... But this time, he went too far!!!

William personally invaded Marcão’s house and teleported him into a game, in a place called "Bartolândia"... And William even stole his strawberry cake on his birthday!! Help THE KING escape the game and give William a beating, showing who the best player of all time is.

"Num Dá Véi!" is a 3D platformer and adventure game where you must dodge and destroy obstacles that appear in your path, but be careful—anything dangerous that touches you can be fatal! This game was created for the Bart GameDev channel as a birthday present on 10/30/2023.
summary: Num Dá Véi is a 3D platformer game by William Jacob. Created as a birthday present for the Bart GameDev channel on 10/30/2023, the game challenges you to dodge and destroy obstacles that stand in your way. But be careful—anything dangerous that touches you could be fatal!
